title: How to Make Monster Energy Drink Cupcakes

steps.headline: Line a muffin pan with liners.
In a bowl, combine the soda and the cake mix.
steps.description: Stir the mixture with a whisk until a majority of the lumps are gone.

steps.headline: Fill each liner halfway full with the batter.
Bake 18 to 20 minutes.
steps.description: To test if they are ready, stick a toothpick into the cupcake, and if it comes out clean then it is baked enough.

steps.headline: Allow the cupcakes to dry completely, and then decorate them however you choose.

text: Preheat your oven to 350 degrees.  Line a muffin pan with liners.  In a bowl, combine the soda and the cake mix. Stir the mixture with a whisk until a majority of the lumps are gone. Fill each liner halfway full with the batter.  Bake 18 to 20 minutes. To test if they are ready, stick a toothpick into the cupcake, and if it comes out clean then it is baked enough. Allow the cupcakes to dry completely, and then decorate them however you choose.
sentences: Line a muffin pan with liners.
In a bowl, combine the soda and the cake mix.
Stir the mixture with a whisk until a majority of the lumps are gone.
Fill each liner halfway full with the batter.
To test if they are ready, stick a toothpick into the cupcake, and if it comes out clean then it is baked enough.
Allow the cupcakes to dry completely, and then decorate them however you choose.
